cookingTips: Use heavy-duty foil or parchment to create individual packets that trap steam and keep ingredients moist
Slice sweet potatoes thin so they cook through in the same time as the pork chops
Assemble packets ahead of time and refrigerate until ready to bake
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through assembling foil packets evenly so all components cook at the same rate. Emphasize sealing tightly to retain moisture and flavor.
